## Description
* Mandelbrot set plotter in PNG format.
## Usage
* `cargo run -- <OUTPUT-FILE-NAME> <PIXELS> <UPPERLEFT> <LOWERRIGHT> <SEQUENTIAL:0|PARALLEL:1>`
* Example: `cargo run -- mandel.png 1000x750 -1.20,0.35 -1,0.20 1`
